questions.question: This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows them to manipulate gravity. What is...?
This ability, possessed by a character known as 'The Phoenix,' allows for regenerative powers. What is...?
questions.answer: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix

questions.question: This technique used by Luffy in Gear Fourth involves inflating his muscles and using Haki to maintain form. What is...?
This character, the captain of the Heart Pirates and a key ally of the Straw Hat Pirates, is known for his surgical skills and the Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
